channel.title: Few Problems
channel.description:
Could anyone help me with these.
I want to make it so my players by typing ::switch, there automatically changed to ancients.
Secondly, I'd like it so when players use the emote which is named 'Bank' it lets them use the bank..
All help is aprreciated thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2007, 10:15:06 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Few Problems

item.description:

Soz, read it as he didn’t want people to bank.

item.title: Few Problems
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

taylor you left something out my friend
find the case, delete everything and add
openUpBank();
compile, but if you want to rename the emote, then gl i dont know how

Read full topic

item.title: Few Problems
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

For bank, you just find the case. Case number is found by hovering mouse over that emote. Top left corner of screen says ‘ok, case#’
For switch

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic
